title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Serious crime down, but murders increase.” [From the Rocky Mountain News, Denver, Colorado, 11 May 1988. Submitted by Jeff Lovill, Westminster, Colorado.]
